name: Ana
description: One of the founding members of Overwatch, Ana uses her skills and expertise to defend her home and the people she cares for. Equipped with a versatile arsenal, she wields her sniper rifle to aid allies and damage enemies from across the battlefield.

abilities.name: Biotic Rifle
abilities.description: Long-range rifle that heals allies and damages enemies.  Hold to zoom in.

abilities.name: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: Fires a dart that puts an enemy to sleep.

abilities.name: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Throws a grenade that heals and increases healing on allies, while damaging and preventing healing on enemies.

abilities.name: Nano Boost
abilities.description: Increases an ally's damage, while reducing damage taken.

story: A founding member of Overwatch and once renowned as the greatest sniper in the world, Ana Amari comes from a long line of decorated military veterans. Though she was thought to have perished in a firefight with Talon, Ana has rejoined the fray to protect her country, family, and closest allies.
